price: Ambao wanashika Swala, na wanatoa Zaka, na Akhera wana yakini nayo.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ
footnotes: Waumini hao ndio wanao ishika Swala kwa unyenyekevu na kutimiliza nguzo, na wanatoa Zaka kwa nyakati zake, nao wana yakini ya maisha ya baadaye Akhera, na yatayo kuwa huko ya adhabu na thawabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūna
